Pirate Metrics - five key metrics for business

16 Jan 2013

Pirate Metrics analyzes your business by tracking 5 key metrics, then helps you improve your product and increase your revenue. It’s the best analytics tool for your subscription business. AARRR!

Looks very interesting. I like the simplicity of having five things that you focus on.

  • Acquisition - Come from various channels
  • Activation - enjoy a 'happy' first experience'
  • Retention - come back, and visit many more times
  • Referral - like enough to tell others
  • Revenue - Conduct some kind of monetization behaviour

Read more at Piratemetrics.com.
